skills.skill: SAP ERP and SAP APO Integration

duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct OMP implementation and support for Demand and Supply Planning functional projects
Manage master and transactional data required for Demand and Supply Planning
Coordinate solution design, development, and testing
Manage L3 tickets and technical support for OMP systems
Integrate OMP with SAP ERP and SAP APO
Operate within European time zones as necessary

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
